item.title: Inside Salman Khan's Jamnagar birthday bash with family, friends, fireworks, and Anant Ambani - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Inside Salman Khan's Jamnagar Birthday Bash with Family and Friends

Date: Dec 28, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Salman Khan celebrated his 59th birthday in Jamnagar, Gujarat, surrounded by family and friends. The event featured fireworks and was hosted by the Ambanis, with several moments shared on social media.

  • Salman celebrated with family and close friends.
  • Videos and pictures from the birthday bash were widely shared.
  • Deanne Panday shared multiple photos showcasing the birthday festivities.
  • A neon sign and portrayal of love for Salman were prominent features.
  • Friends from the film industry including Varun Dhawan and Ajay Devgn sent their wishes.
  • Salman's notable past films include 'Hum Aapke Hain Koun' and 'Dabangg'.
  • He is set to star in 'Sikandar', releasing during Eid 2025.
“Happy Birthday @beingsalmankhan” - Deanne Panday

Overall, the birthday bash was a heartfelt celebration of Salman Khan’s life, showcasing love and camaraderie among family and friends.

item.title: Kalki 2 can wait; For Deepika, daughter Dua is her first priority - 123telugu
item.description:
Deepika Padukone Prioritizes Daughter Dua Over Film Projects

Published on Dec 28, 2024 2:00 pm IST

Bollywood actress Deepika Padukone emphasizes her commitment to her daughter Dua amid her busy career, stating that she is in no rush to resume filming the highly anticipated sequel, Kalki 2.

  • Deepika starred in the first part of Kalki 2898 AD and is expected to have a larger role in the sequel.
  • She prioritizes raising her daughter herself over returning to work, rejecting the idea of hiring a nanny.
  • Kalki 2 also stars Amitabh Bachchan and Kamal Haasan and is set to begin filming in summer 2025.
  • The sequel is anticipated to release in theaters worldwide in 2026.
“I will raise my daughter myself, just the way my mom raised me,” said Deepika Padukone.

This statement underscores Deepika's values as she balances her roles as a mother and a film star.

item.title: Angry fans slam paparazzi for revealing Varun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal's daughter Lara's face without their consent - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Angry Fans Slam Paparazzi for Revealing Varun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal's Daughter Lara's Face Without Consent

Date: Dec 28, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Varun Dhawan and wife Natasha Dalal were recently spotted with their daughter Lara at the Mumbai airport, where the paparazzi captured her face without parental consent, sparking outrage among fans.

  • Fans criticized the paparazzi for invading privacy.
  • Varun has not publicly revealed his daughter’s face before this incident.
  • Comments on social media convey strong disapproval of the paparazzi's actions.
“This is such a gross invasion of a child’s privacy. Disgusting behaviour!!”

This incident raises important questions about privacy boundaries for public figures and their families.

item.title: Twinkle Khanna opens up on Akshay Kumar's reaction when she decided to move to UK with their daughter Nit - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Twinkle Khanna opens up on Akshay Kumar's reaction when she decided to move to UK with their daughter Nitara to study further

Publication Date: Not mentioned Source: Not mentioned

In a recent interview, Twinkle Khanna shared her thoughts on moving to the UK with their daughter Nitara for further studies. She highlighted the support she received from her husband, Akshay Kumar, regarding this significant decision.

  • Twinkle Khanna plans to move to the UK to facilitate their daughter Nitara's education.
  • She expressed confidence in her decision, stating that even if Akshay was not supportive, she would have proceeded with it.
  • This move reflects Twinkle's commitment to providing quality education for her daughter.
“Even if he was not fine, I would have...”

Khanna's remarks emphasize her strong belief in prioritizing education, underscoring the importance of making such decisions for their child's future.

item.title: Pushpa 2 worldwide box office collection Day 23: Allu Arjun-starrer only Rs 69 cr away from taking over Baahubali 2, earns Rs 1719 cr - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Hits ₹1719 Cr, Closing in on Baahubali 2

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Indian Express

Allu Arjun’s blockbuster film, Pushpa 2: The Rule, continues to perform exceptionally well at the box office, nearing Baahubali 2's record.

  • The film has grossed ₹1719.5 crore globally.
  • Pushed over ₹1128.85 crore net in India, achieving these numbers within 23 days.
  • Faced competition from new releases but maintained strong earnings.
  • Achieved ₹8.75 crore net on its fourth Friday, reflecting natural declines with passage of time.
“The makers announced the film as the fastest Indian film to cross the ₹1700 crore mark.”

Pushpa 2's performance is notable, straddling both commercial success and controversy due to a recent incident at a special show. The film's lead actor, Allu Arjun, was involved in an ongoing case related to a tragic event during one of these screenings.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Salman Khan playfully grills Eisha Singh with rumoured boyfriend Shalin Bhanot's name; asks - The Times of India
item.description:
Salman Khan Questions Eisha Singh About Shalin Bhanot in Bigg Boss 18

Publication Date: [Date Not Provided] Source: [Source Not Provided]

In the latest episode of Bigg Boss 18, host Salman Khan humorously interrogates contestant Eisha Singh regarding her rumored boyfriend Shalin Bhanot.

  • Salman Khan brings up the name of Eisha's rumored boyfriend, Shalin Bhanot.
  • The host playfully asks about her last phone call before entering the house.
  • This incident adds a layer of intrigue and entertainment to the season.
“Last phone call kiske the jab aap iss ghar mein aaye thi?” - Salman Khan

The interaction between Salman Khan and Eisha Singh not only highlights the playful dynamics of the show but also keeps the audience engaged with the contestants' personal lives.

item.title: Numerology Horoscope Today: Predictions for December 28, 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Numerology Horoscope Today: Predictions for December 28, 2024

Publication Date: December 27, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Today’s numerology readings provide personalized advice for individuals based on their birthdates, highlighting the significance of careful decision-making, relationship management, and personal expression.

  • Number 1: Caution in financial decisions; focus on saving.
  • Number 2: Balance ambition with sensitivity to others.
  • Number 3: Opportunity to express creativity and influence others.
  • Number 4: Importance of emotional expression for relationship building.
  • Number 5: Embrace transitional chaos for positive change.
  • Number 6: Engage in meaningful discussions respectfully.
  • Number 7: Exercise caution with sensitive information.
  • Number 8: Take initiative in group activities to lead effectively.
  • Number 9: Trust your judgment over seeking approval from others.
“Trust in the work already done. Don’t strive for approval; rather, take confident actions on your own.”

This numerology horoscope emphasizes both personal insight and the importance of influencing relationships positively.

item.title: After KGF, Srinidhi Shetty joins this most awaited franchise? - 123telugu
item.description:
After KGF, Srinidhi Shetty joins this most awaited franchise?

Published on Dec 28, 2024 | Source: 123telugu

Young Kannada actress Srinidhi Shetty is set to star in the much-anticipated sequel, Jailer 2, alongside Kollywood Superstar Rajinikanth.

  • Srinidhi gained fame from the KGF franchise.
  • She has signed two Telugu films, including Siddu Jonnalagadda’s Telusu Kada and Nani’s HIT 3.
  • Jailer 2 is being directed by Nelson and produced by Sun Pictures.
  • Anirudh Ravichander will compose the music for the film.
  • Official confirmation of her role is still pending.
"An official confirmation regarding Srinidhi’s inclusion in Jailer 2’s cast is awaited."

More updates on the film are expected during the New Year’s Eve or the Pongal festival.

item.title: ‘Baby John’ box office collection Day 3: Varun Dhawan starrer misses Rs 20 crore mark as collections fall - TOI Etimes
item.description:
‘Baby John’ Box Office Collection Day 3: Varun Dhawan Starrer Misses Rs 20 Crore Mark

Date: [Date not provided] Source: [Source not provided]

Despite an initial positive reception, Varun Dhawan's latest film 'Baby John' has seen a significant drop in box office collections, raising concerns about its overall performance.

  • Day 3 collections fell to Rs 3.65 crore.
  • The total earnings have not yet reached the Rs 20 crore milestone.
  • Analysts are predicting a difficult path ahead for the film in theaters.

item.title: Zayed Khan's Net Worth: Shah Rukh Khan's Main Hoon Na Co-Star Richer Than Prabhas, Ranbir Kapoor And Ram Ch - News18
item.description:
Zayed Khan's Net Worth: Shah Rukh Khan's Co-Star Surpasses Bollywood Rivals

Date: December 28, 2024

Source: ET Now

Zayed Khan, who rose to fame in Bollywood known for his role in Main Hoon Na, has transitioned into business, amassing a net worth of approximately Rs 1,500 crore, surpassing many of his contemporaries.

  • Zayed Khan debuted in Bollywood at 22 with Chura Liyaa Hai Tumne.
  • He became popular with his role in Main Hoon Na alongside Shah Rukh Khan.
  • His wealth reportedly exceeds that of Ranbir Kapoor (Rs 550 crore), Prabhas (Rs 400 crore), Allu Arjun (Rs 350 crore), and Ram Charan (Rs 1,300 crore).
  • Zayed now focuses on investments in startups, leveraging his business management education.
  • He humorously dismissed inquiries about his net worth during an interview.
“Live within your means.” - Zayed Khan

This impressive financial growth illustrates how Zayed Khan has successfully leveraged his fame into lucrative business ventures, positioning him as a wealthier figure in Bollywood.

item.title: Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024: Check here Astrological predictions for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024

Published On: Dec 28, 2024

Published By: Ayush Bisht

Find out your daily astrological predictions for love, health, money, and career for all zodiac signs. This horoscope provides insights into how different signs will navigate the day.

  • Aries: Moderate day; avoid risks.
  • Taurus: Professional excellence and deepened relationships.
  • Gemini: Hard work will yield positive outcomes.
  • Cancer: Positive atmosphere, smooth progress in personal matters.
  • Leo: Seek harmony at home, avoid hasty decisions.
  • Virgo: Networking benefits, businesses thrive.
  • Libra: Quality family time, improved living standards.
  • Scorpio: Enhance reputation through cooperation.
  • Sagittarius: Patience in planning, respect traditions.
  • Capricorn: Focus on financial goals, impactful communications.
  • Aquarius: Positive career developments and support from power.
  • Pisces: Successful long-term plans and enhanced spirituality.

item.title: WWE SmackDown Results – 12/27/24 (Chelsea Green Championship celebration) - Wrestleview.com
item.description:
WWE SmackDown Results – December 27, 2024

Date: December 27, 2024
Source: Wrestleview.com

The latest episode of WWE SmackDown featured significant developments in several ongoing storylines, including Chelsea Green's Championship celebration and a heated match featuring top female talents.

  • Bianca Belair, Naomi, and Bayley defeated Tiffany Stratton, Nia Jax, and Candice LeRae.
  • Braun Strowman emerged victorious against Austin Theory.
  • The Street Profits secured a win over Garza and Humberto.
  • Chelsea Green celebrated as the longest reigning WWE Women’s United States Champion, facing off with Michin who interrupted her celebration.
  • Nick Aldis issued a stern warning to Kevin Owens regarding the Winged Eagle Championship.
“A fun opening match. Tiffany Stratton is getting the biggest reaction and her cash in is going to be one of the biggest pops of the year.” — Wrestleview.com

The episode set up exciting future matchups and highlighted ongoing rivalries within WWE.

item.title: Stree 2, Pushpa 2 Save 'A Khan-Less Year' At Box Office? Film Experts Say '2024 Was Disappointing' | Exclus - News18
item.description:
Stree 2 and Pushpa 2 Brighten a Disappointing 2024 at the Box Office

Last Updated: December 28, 2024, 10:30 IST | Source: News18

2024 has been marked by unexpected hits and losses, with Stree 2 leading the pack as the highest Bollywood earner, while Pushpa 2 broke records as the biggest Indian film of all time.

  • Stree 2 grossed over Rs 800 crore, establishing itself as a major success.
  • Pushpa 2 crossed Rs 1700 crores, outperforming other top releases.
  • Experts highlight that 2024 has been disappointing, falling behind 2023's box office achievements by 15-40%.
  • High-profile films like Fighter and Singham Again failed to attract significant audiences.
  • Smaller films performed better in the box office compared to expected blockbusters.
“If we compare this year with that of 2023, I’ll have to say that this year has been disappointing.” – Girish Johar

The article discusses how 2024 struggled to match the bar set by the previous year, with only a few films achieving notable success.

item.title: Spoiler: Planned Match and Segment Revealed for 12/27 WWE SmackDown - Ringside News
item.description:
Planned Match and Segment Revealed for 12/27 WWE SmackDown

Date: December 27, 2024

Source: Ringside News

WWE SmackDown is gearing up for its final episode of 2024, promising exciting developments as it transitions to a new three-hour format. Fans can look forward to a title celebration and a major six-woman tag team match.

  • Chelsea Green will celebrate her victory as the new Women’s United States Champion.
  • A six-woman tag team match will feature Naomi and Bianca Belair teaming with Bayley against Nia Jax, Tiffany Stratton, and Candice LeRae.
  • The episode aims to build anticipation for 2025 as stories unfold.
“What are you most excited about for SmackDown’s final episode of 2024?”

As the year closes, fans are eager for what’s to come in 2025, with the final episode promising a taste of the future.

item.title: Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 predicts good career options knocks you - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024

Date: Dec 28, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

The daily horoscope prediction for Pisces suggests multiple career opportunities and emphasizes the importance of health and relationships. It advises caution around office politics and promotes financial prudence.

  • Multiple opportunities in career await Pisces natives today.
  • Financial prosperity is on the horizon, but expenses may rise.
  • Health should be monitored, especially for those with prior cardiac conditions.
  • Relationships require open communication, especially in love affairs.
  • Be mindful of office dynamics to maintain a good reputation.
“Stick to principles at the office and ensure you keep the lover happy in the relationship.”

This horoscope offers valuable insights into various aspects of life, from love and career to health, guiding Pisces individuals to make informed decisions today.

item.title: Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 advices trying luck in stock - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 to know your astrological predictions.

Date: Dec 28, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Today brings new love and better professional chances for Aquarius individuals. It’s important to overcome workplace challenges for a productive day while being cautious about finances.

  • New love and better professional opportunities are highlighted today.
  • Productivity at work is a focus, with multiple chances for advancement.
  • Financial issues are minor but may arise later in the day; caution is advised in money matters.
  • A love horoscope indicates minor ego-related issues may occur but won’t damage relationships.
  • Career aspects are promising, with chances for IT and business professionals to make abroad connections.
“The inflow of money will not be as good as you expected.”

In conclusion, while today is filled with positive opportunities, maintaining financial caution will be crucial for a smooth experience.

item.title: Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 predicts a productive love affair - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Capricorn Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 to know your astrological predictions

Date & Source: Dec 28, 2024 04:09 AM IST

Today's horoscope indicates a productive love affair, success in finances, and positive developments in health and career for Capricorns.

  • Focus on happiness in love and be clear about your needs with your partner.
  • Expect new job responsibilities that will enhance your strength.
  • Successful opportunities regarding loans and buying property are present today.
  • No major health issues, but maintain a healthy lifestyle.
"Your commitment at work will bring positive results."

In conclusion, today is a favorable day for Capricorns, with numerous opportunities for love, success in finances, and a positive outlook on health.

item.title: Sagittarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 predicts fortune abroad - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sagittarius Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 predicts fortune abroad

Date: Dec 28, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Today's horoscope suggests that Sagittarius individuals have the potential to try their fortune abroad. Significant developments in personal and professional life are on the horizon.

  • Unconditional love towards partners enhances personal relationships.
  • Professionals may face challenges, including ego clashes, but should stay patient and innovative.
  • Financial stability is present, with possible salary hikes and repayments of dues.
  • Caution is advised regarding health, especially concerning heart and chest-related issues.

“You decide the destiny.”

Today's insights indicate a balance of love, career, and finances, promoting a focus on health and well-being.

item.title: Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 astro tips for fiscal growth - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024

Date: December 28, 2024, Source: Hindustan Times

Today, Scorpios are advised to manage their finances carefully and focus on love and relationships. Time spent with loved ones will enhance bonding.

  • Be romantic and avoid harsh work decisions.
  • Manage professional challenges to ensure productivity.
  • Handle any potential legal financial issues wisely.
  • Focus on health and avoid letting stress affect well-being.
  • Single Scorpios may find love, while married individuals could experience family growth.
"Exploring love today can open up new romantic opportunities."

In conclusion, today is a day for Scorpios to cultivate relationships and be cautious with finances.

item.title: Libra Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 predicts good returns - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Libra Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 to know your astrological predictions.

Date: Dec 28, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Minor monetary issues will not impact routine life today. Focus on expressing emotions and maintaining productivity at work.

  • Express love freely and seek pleasant moments in relationships.
  • Professional productivity is expected despite minor challenges.
  • Be cautious with financial decisions; avoid lending large sums.
  • Health should be prioritized; maintain a balanced lifestyle.
  • Business opportunities in textiles and fashion are promising.
“Ensure you are happy in love; the second part of the day is good to make a call in the future.”

The horoscope suggests looking for opportunities and maintaining a positive attitude for a fruitful day.

item.title: Virgo Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 predicts incoming wealth - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Virgo Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024

Date: December 28, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The horoscope suggests that wealth and health are looking positive for Virgos today. There is potential for love affairs to blossom, especially in the second half of the day.

  • Settle differences in love and focus on work commitments.
  • Introducing a partner to family is favorable.
  • Ample opportunities for career advancement exist today.
  • Financial management is key as wealth incoming must be balanced with spending.
  • Health is stable; good for medical procedures and adopting healthy habits.
"Though wealth will come in, it is good to have control over the expenditure." - Dr. J.N. Pandey

Overall, December 28, 2024, is a promising day for Virgos in terms of relationships, finances, and health.

item.title: Cancer Daily Horoscope Today, Dec 28, 2024 predicts success knocks your door - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Cancer Daily Horoscope Today, December 28, 2024 predicts success knocks your door

Date: Dec 28, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Today, Cancer natives can expect a favorable day financially, but should be cautious in love and work relationships.

  • Success will be a key theme today.
  • Financial prosperity is highlighted, reflecting on lifestyle improvements.
  • Challenges may arise in love, and egos should be managed.
  • Health remains stable, but minor ailments could persist.
  • Careers may face challenges, but efforts will lead to recognition.
  • Entrepreneurs can expect new business opportunities and financial growth.
“Do not let a third person interfere in the relationship.”

In conclusion, maintaining strong personal relationships while seizing financial opportunities is essential for Cancer individuals today.
